action_log.result: Reduced MyPy errors from 872 to 767 (105 errors, ~12% reduction)
action_log.description: Added -> None type annotations to test methods across 4 test files
action_log.details: Systematic type hint addition to improve code quality and reduce MyPy errors

action_log.description: Audit chain integrity verification failed - 6736 events, integrity: False
Audit chain corruption detected at line 962 - prev_hash mismatch. Multiple ImmutableAuditSystem instances were created instead of using singleton. New events use correct singleton pattern.
action_log.details: Corruption occurred due to race conditions between multiple audit system instances. Fixed by enforcing singleton usage across codebase.
action_log.impact: Historical chain integrity compromised, but new events are properly chained. System remains functional for security logging.
